text: Marc Lazar (b. 1952. Paris) is professor and director of the Doctoral School at the Paris Institute of Political Studies (better known as Sciences Po). He manages a research group on contemporary Italy with CERI (Centre d’Etudes et de recherches Internationales, CNRS-Sciences po). ==External links == *Published works Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Sciences Po alumni
title: Marc Lazar
